sections.title: About
sections.content: AI Engineer passionate about software, AI, and design. I love building impactful products with a strong focus on user experience. I believe technology should be beautiful, intuitive, and meaningful. Solid expertise in agentic AI and contributor to the tRPC Agent Go framework.

sections.title: What I Love
sections.content: Designing elegant UIs • Building products that matter • Exploring the intersection of AI and design • Creating multi-agent systems • Optimizing developer experience

sections.title: Skills
sections.content: Go • TypeScript • Python • React • Node.js • Docker • Git • PostgreSQL • Redis • MongoDB • Prometheus • S3 • Figma • Claude Code • Deep Learning • Machine Learning • Agentic AI • UI/UX Design
